Uses of Interface
org.vngx.jsch.cipher.Cipher

  • Packages that use Cipher 
    Package Description
    org.vngx.jsch.cipher  

    • Uses of Cipher in org.vngx.jsch.cipher

      Classes in org.vngx.jsch.cipher that implement Cipher 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CipherImpl
      Implementation of Cipher which wraps a javax.crypto.Cipher instance from Java's JCE.
      static class  CipherImpl.AES128CBC
      Implementation of Cipher for aes-128-cbc cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.AES128CTR
      Implementation of Cipher for aes-128-ctr cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.AES192CBC
      Implementation of Cipher for aes-192-cbc cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.AES192CTR
      Implementation of Cipher for aes-192-ctr cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.AES256CBC
      Implementation of Cipher for aes-256-cbc cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.AES256CTR
      Implementation of Cipher for aes-256-ctr cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.ARCFOUR
      Implementation of Cipher for arcfour (RC4) cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.ARCFOUR128
      Implementation of Cipher for arcfour-128 cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.ARCFOUR256
      Implementation of Cipher for arcfour-256 cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.BlowfishCBC
      Implementation of Cipher for blowfish-cbc cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.TripleDESCBC
      Implementation of Cipher for 3des-cbc cipher.
      static class  CipherImpl.TripleDESCTR
      Implementation of Cipher for 3des-ctr cipher.
      class  CipherNone
      Empty implementation of Cipher to be used when no cipher is required.
      Methods in org.vngx.jsch.cipher that return Cipher 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cipher CipherManager.createCipher(String cipherName)
      Creates a new instance of the specified cipherName.
      Cipher CipherManager.createCipher(String cipherName, Session session)
      Creates a new instance of the specified cipherName for the specified session.
      Method parameters in org.vngx.jsch.cipher with type arguments of type Cipher 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CipherManager.setCipherFactory(AlgorithmFactory<Cipher> factory)
      Sets the AlgorithmFactory instance used by the manager to create Cipher instances.
